summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting letters submitted for Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell to detain them. This shows coordination between prosecutors regarding pre-trial detention efforts for both defendants.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email requesting letters submitted for Epstein and Maxwell's detention. Works at the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: One of the defendants for whom detention letters were submitted. Referenced as subject of the prosecutor's inquiry.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: One of the defendants for whom detention letters were submitted. Referenced alongside Epstein in the prosecutor's request.

connections.description: Both are referenced as defendants in the same legal context, with prosecutors seeking detention letters for both individuals.
Prosecutor seeking detention letters for Epstein as a defendant in their case.
Prosecutor seeking detention letters for Maxwell as a defendant in their case.

events.title: Prosecutor Requests Detention Letters
events.description: Assistant United States Attorney emails requesting any letters submitted for detaining Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations.name: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
locations.address: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007

keyFacts: Prosecutors were actively seeking detention letters for both Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell in October 2019.
The email shows coordination between legal authorities regarding pre-trial detention efforts for the two defendants.
The correspondence originated from the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating federal prosecution involvement.
Both Epstein and Maxwell were referenced as defendants in the same context, suggesting their cases were being handled together or in parallel.
